channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Powerball jackpot hits $1.7 billion, its third-highest prize ever
item.description: The odds of winning the Powerball jackpot are one in 292.2 million, according to official lottery data.

item.title: The Google antitrust ruling gives its AI rivals one big reason to cheer
item.description: OpenAI, Perplexity, Meta. and others could benefit from judge's order that Google share its 'search index'

item.title: Exclusive: Crypto firm Fireblocks launches a stablecoin payments network
item.description: More than 40 companies have joined the network, including Bridge, a stablecoin startup recently acquired by the fintech giant Stripe.

item.title: Google stock hits all-time high after government backs down and it has AI rivals to thank
item.description: Alphabetâ€™s stock closed up 8% Thursday at $231.10, its highest level ever.

item.title: Bank of America says the unemployment rate for recent grads is rising faster than all workers
item.description: The report finds that over 13% of unemployed Americans in July were "new entrants" or first-time job-seekers, "which skews towards Gen Z."

item.title: Economic calendar: Miran hearing and services-sector data still to come
Five money moves to make if you win the gargantuan Powerball lottery jackpot
Stock-index futures lose altitude as Challenger data presage layoff increase
